Errors.NoProvider: No browser extension detected, install MetaMask on desktop or visit from a dApp browser on mobile.
Errors.NotConnectedToSupportedNetwork: You're connected to an unsupported network, please Switch to Avalanche.

LiquidityPage.Message: Output is estimated. If the price changes by more than the max slippage your transaction will revert.

RiskContent.Title: Risk
RiskContent.Description: Providing liquidity to Axial is risky. Before using the protocol, we highly recommend reading the code and understanding the risks of being a liquidity provider and/or using the Automatic Market Maker (AMM) to trade value-pegged crytpocurrency assets.

GovernancePage.VotingPeriodShouldBeBetween: Voting period should be between {{min}} and {{max}} {{unit}}
GovernancePage.ActiveProposalsDescriptions: To vote, members must stake their SNOB for xSNOB. Read about proposal details in the Snowball Discord
GovernancePage.MinGovernanceTokenToSubmitError: You must stake at least {{amount}} {{name}} to submit a proposal
GovernancePage.YouHaventVotedOnThisProposalYet: You haven't voted on this proposal yet
GovernancePage.YouDidntVoteOnThisProposal: You didn't vote on this proposal

VoteAllocation.BottomDescs: This chart shows the current SNOB reward allocations per pool (updated daily).
VoteAllocation.Name: Name
VoteAllocation.IfPercentage: If the percentage is not exactly 100%, we will fit proportionally your choice.
VoteAllocation.TopDescs: Once you've voted, your votes will continue to rollover each week. There is no need to revote unless you want to change the distribution you've voted for.

Staking.UnlockTokensAtTheEndOfTheLockingPeriod: Unlock Tokens At The End Of The Locking Period
Staking.StakingBottomDescriptions_GOVERNANCETOKE: Your {{governanceTokenName}} tokens will linearly decrease in amount and will be unlocked daily. Daily you can withdraw your {{mainTokenName}} tokens.
Staking.WithdrawBottomDescriptions_GOVERNANCETOK: Your {{governanceTokenName}} tokens will linearly decrease in amount and will be unlocked daily. Daily you can withdraw your {{mainTokenName}} tokens.
Staking.StakingPageFirstDescTitle_MAINTOKENNAME: Stake your {{mainTokenName}} to earn tokens, boost your yields and vote.
Staking.StakingPageFirstDesc: Your {{governanceTokenName}} tokens will linearly decrease in amount and will be unlocked daily. Daily you can withdraw your {{mainTokenName}} tokens.  Read more
Staking.StakingPageSecondDesc_GOVERNANCETOKENNAM: Your {{governanceTokenName}} tokens will linearly decrease in amount and will be unlocked daily. Daily you can withdraw your {{mainTokenName}} tokens.
